snippet: Home prices in Trinidad and Tobago fell by about 20 percent after the global real estate crisis of 2008 and have yet to fully recover.
abstract: International House Hunting column; 7,000 square foot clifftop villa with Balinese pavilions and Atlantic Ocean views near Scarborough, largest city on Tobago, is listed at $4.43 million; market and tips for buying in Trinidad and Tobago highlighted.
lead_paragraph: Home prices in Trinidad and Tobago fell by about 20 percent after the global real estate crisis of 2008 and have yet to fully recover.
